content:
Great choices! You're going to love "Schitt's Creek" and "Parks and Recreation"!

As for "The Good Place", it's actually not available on Hulu. However, you can stream "The Good Place" on **Netflix**! All four seasons are currently available on the platform, so you can binge-watch to your heart's content.

So, to recap:

* "Schitt's Creek" is on Netflix
* "Parks and Recreation" is on Hulu
* "The Good Place" is on Netflix

Enjoy your binge-watching adventures!
